      • convertToPositiveNormalForm

        public static Expression convertToPositiveNormalForm(Expression expr)
        Convert a Boolean expression to positive normal form, i.e., remove any instances of =>, <=> or () and then push all negation inwards so that it only occurs on "propositions". A "proposition" is any Expression object that is not an operator used to define a Boolean expression (!, &, |, =>, <=>, ()). The passed in expression is modified, and the result is returned.

      • convertLTLToPositiveNormalForm

        public static Expression convertLTLToPositiveNormalForm(Expression expr)
        Convert an LTL formula to positive normal form, i.e., remove any instances of =>, <=> or () and then push all negation inwards so that it only occurs on "propositions". A "proposition" is any Expression object that is not an operator used to define a Boolean expression (!, &, |, =>, <=>, ()) or a temporal operator (X, U, F, G, R, W). The passed in expression is modified, and the result is returned.

      • removeImpliesIffAndParentheses

        private static Expression removeImpliesIffAndParentheses(Expression expr)
        Remove any instances of =>, <=> or () by expanding/deleting as appropriate.

      • doConversionToPositiveNormalForm

        private static Expression doConversionToPositiveNormalForm(Expression expr,
                                                           boolean ltl)
        Do the main part of the conversion of a Boolean expression to positive normal form, i.e., push all negation inwards to the propositions. If ltl is false, it is assumed that the Boolean expression comprises only the Boolean operators !, & and |. If ltl is true, the expression can also contain temporal operators (X, U, F, G, R, W). Anything else is treated as a proposition. The passed in expression is modified, and the result is returned.

      • convertToDNF

        public static Expression convertToDNF(Expression expr)
        Convert an expression to disjunctive normal form (DNF). The passed in expression is modified, and the result is returned.

      • convertToDNFLists

        public static java.util.List<java.util.List<Expression>> convertToDNFLists(Expression expr)
        Convert an expression to disjunctive normal form (DNF). The passed in expression is modified, and the result is returned as a list of lists of Expression;

      • doConversionToDNF
